verses.verse: וּבִשְׁנַת֙ <WH8141> year שְׁמֹנֶ֣ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֔ה <WH6240> teen לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of king יָרָבְעָ֣ם <WH3379> Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָ֑ט <WH5028> of Nebat מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigned אֲבִיָּ֖ם <WH38> Abijam עַל־ <WH5921> over יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> over Judah

שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> Three שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> he in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's מַעֲכָ֖ה <WH4601> [was] Maachah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter אֲבִישָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH53> of Abishalom

וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <WH1980> walked בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all חַטֹּ֥אות <WH2403> in all the sins אָבִ֖יו <WH1> of his father אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> which he had done לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> before וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become לְבָב֤וֹ <WH3824> him and his heart שָׁלֵם֙ <WH8003> was not perfect עִם־ <WH5973> with יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> with the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <WH430> his God כִּלְבַ֖ב <WH3824> as the heart דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> of David אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> sake דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> Nevertheless for David's נָתַן֩ <WH5414> give יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> sake did the LORD אֱלֹהָ֥יו <WH430> his God ל֛וֹ נִ֖יר <WH5216> him a lamp בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem לְהָקִ֤ים <WH6965> to set up אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> his son אַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> after וּֽלְהַעֲמִ֖יד <WH5975> him and to establish אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> because עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> did דָוִ֛ד <WH1732> Because David אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the eyes יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not סָ֞ר <WH5493> and turned not aside מִכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> because צִוָּ֗הוּ <WH6680> from any [thing] that he commanded כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> him all the days חַיָּ֔יו <WH2416> of his life רַ֕ק <WH7535> in בִּדְבַ֖ר <WH1697> save only in the matter אוּרִיָּ֥ה <WH223> of Uriah הַחִתִּֽי׃ <WH2850> the Hittite

וּמִלְחָמָ֨ה <WH4421> And there was war הָיְתָ֧ה <WH1961> become בֵין־ <WH996> between רְחַבְעָ֛ם <WH7346> between Rehoboam וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> and Jeroboam כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> all the days חַיָּֽיו׃ <WH2416> of his life

וְיֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> of the acts אֲבִיָּם֙ <WH38> of Abijam וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> and all that he did הֲלֽוֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> Judah וּמִלְחָמָ֥ה <WH4421> battle הָיְתָ֛ה <WH1961> become בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between אֲבִיָּ֖ם <WH38> between Abijam וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between יָרָבְעָֽם׃ <WH3379> and Jeroboam

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept אֲבִיָּם֙ <WH38> And Abijam עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <WH6912> and they buried אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> him in the city דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אָסָ֥א <WH609> and Asa בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ

וּבִשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> And in the twentieth לְיָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigned אָסָ֖א <WH609> Asa מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> over Judah

וְאַרְבָּעִ֤ים <WH705> And forty וְאַחַת֙ <WH259> and one שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> he in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's מַעֲכָ֖ה <WH4601> [was] Maachah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter אֲבִישָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH53> of Abishalom

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> did אָסָ֛א <WH609> And Asa הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the eyes יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> as [did] David אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

וַיַּעֲבֵ֥ר <WH5674> And he took away הַקְּדֵשִׁ֖ים <WH6945> the sodomites מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> out of the land וַיָּ֙סַר֙ <WH5493> and removed אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגִּלֻּלִ֔ים <WH1544> all the idols אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> had made אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1> that his fathers

וְגַ֣ם ׀ <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> מַעֲכָ֣ה <WH4601> And also Maachah אִמּ֗וֹ <WH517> his mother וַיְסִרֶ֙הָ֙ <WH5493> even her he removed מִגְּבִירָ֔ה <WH1377> from [being] queen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> because עָשְׂתָ֥ה <WH6213> because she had made מִפְלֶ֖צֶת <WH4656> an idol לָאֲשֵׁרָ֑ה <WH842> in a grove וַיִּכְרֹ֤ת <WH3772> destroyed אָסָא֙ <WH609> and Asa אֶת־ <WH853> מִפְלַצְתָּ֔הּ <WH4656> her idol וַיִּשְׂרֹ֖ף <WH8313> and burnt בְּנַ֥חַל <WH5158> [it] by the brook קִדְרֽוֹן׃ <WH6939> Kidron

וְהַבָּמ֖וֹת <WH1116> But the high places לֹא־ <WH3808> were not סָ֑רוּ <WH5493> were not removed רַ֣ק <WH7535> but לְבַב־ <WH3824> heart אָסָ֗א <WH609> nevertheless Asa's הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become שָׁלֵ֛ם <WH8003> was perfect עִם־ <WH5973> with יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God כָּל־ <WH3605> all יָמָֽיו׃ <WH3117> all his days

וַיָּבֵא֙ <WH935> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> קָדְשֵׁ֣י <WH6944> had dedicated אָבִ֔יו <WH1> which his father [וְקָדְשֹׁו כ] (וְקָדְשֵׁ֖י <WH6944> the dedicated ק) בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> silver וְזָהָ֖ב <WH2091> and gold וְכֵלִֽים׃ <WH3627> and vessels

וּמִלְחָמָ֨ה <WH4421> And there was war הָיְתָ֜ה <WH1961> become בֵּ֣ין <WH996> between אָסָ֗א <WH609> between Asa וּבֵ֛ין <WH996> between בַּעְשָׁ֥א <WH1201> and Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3117> all their days

וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> went up בַּעְשָׁ֤א <WH1201> And Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> against Judah וַיִּ֖בֶן <WH1129> and built אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָמָ֑ה <WH7414> Ramah לְבִלְתִּ֗י <WH1115> not תֵּ֚ת <WH5414> that he might not suffer יֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> any to go out וָבָ֔א <WH935> or come in לְאָסָ֖א <WH609> to Asa מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took אָ֠סָא <WH609> Then Asa אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֶּ֨סֶף <WH3701> all the silver וְהַזָּהָ֜ב <WH2091> and the gold הַֽנּוֹתָרִ֣ים ׀ <WH3498> [that were] left בְּאוֹצְר֣וֹת <WH214> in the treasures בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֽוֹצְרוֹת֙ <WH214> and the treasures בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house [מֶלֶךְ כ] (הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> and King ק) וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖ם <WH5414> and delivered בְּיַד־ <WH3027> them into the hand עֲבָדָ֑יו <WH5650> of his servants וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֞ם <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's אָסָ֗א <WH609> Asa אֶל־ <WH413> about בֶּן־ הֲ֠דַד <WH1130> them to Benhadad בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son טַבְרִמֹּ֤ן <WH2886> of Tabrimon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֶזְיוֹן֙ <WH2383> of Hezion מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and king אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of Syria הַיֹּשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> that dwelt בְּדַמֶּ֖שֶׂק <WH1834> at Damascus לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

בְּרִית֙ <WH1285> [There is] a league בֵּינִ֣י <WH996> between וּבֵינֶ֔ךָ <WH996> and me between בֵּ֥ין <WH996> and me between אָבִ֖י <WH1> between me and thee [and] between my father וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> and me between אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> and thy father הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> Behold שָׁלַ֨חְתִּֽי <WH7971> behold I have sent לְךָ֥ שֹׁ֙חַד֙ <WH7810> unto thee a present כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> of silver וְזָהָ֔ב <WH2091> and gold לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> go הָפֵ֗רָה <WH6565> and break אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִֽיתְךָ֙ <WH1285> thy league אֶת־ <WH854> with בַּעְשָׁ֣א <WH1201> with Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> that he may depart מֵעָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and

וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> hearkened בֶּן־ הֲדַ֜ד <WH1130> So Benhadad אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto king אָסָ֗א <WH609> Asa וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <WH7971> and sent אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> the captains הַחֲיָלִ֤ים <WH2428> of the hosts אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לוֹ֙ עַל־ <WH5921> against עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> which he had against the cities יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> עִיּ֣וֹן <WH5859> Ijon וְאֶת־ <WH853> דָּ֔ן <WH1835> and Dan וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> אָבֵ֣ל בֵּֽית־ מַעֲכָ֑ה <WH62> and Abelbethmaachah וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כִּנְר֔וֹת <WH3672> and all Cinneroth עַ֖ל <WH5921> besides כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> with all the land נַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <WH5321> of Naphtali

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> heard בַּעְשָׁ֔א <WH1201> And it came to pass when Baasha וַיֶּחְדַּ֕ל <WH2308> [thereof] that he left off מִבְּנ֖וֹת <WH1129> building אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽרָמָ֑ה <WH7414> of Ramah וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt בְּתִרְצָֽה׃ <WH8656> in Tirzah

וְהַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> Then king אָסָ֜א <WH609> Asa הִשְׁמִ֤יעַ <WH8085> made a proclamation אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> to all יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> throughout all Judah אֵ֣ין <WH369> else נָקִ֔י <WH5355> none [was] exempted וַיִּשְׂא֞וּ <WH5375> and they took אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְנֵ֤י <WH68> away the stones הָֽרָמָה֙ <WH7414> of Ramah וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֵצֶ֔יהָ <WH6086> and the timber אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בָּנָ֖ה <WH1129> had builded בַּעְשָׁ֑א <WH1201> thereof wherewith Baasha וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> built בָּם֙ הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and king אָסָ֔א <WH609> Asa אֶת־ <WH853> גֶּ֥בַע <WH1387> with them Geba בִּנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> and Mizpah

וְיֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> The rest כָּל־ <WH3605> of all דִּבְרֵֽי־ <WH1697> of all the acts אָ֠סָא <WH609> of Asa וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all גְּב֨וּרָת֜וֹ <WH1369> and all his might וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> and all that he did וְהֶֽעָרִים֙ <WH5892> and the cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בָּנָ֔ה <WH1129> which he built הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> like כְתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> Judah רַ֚ק <WH7535> but לְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> after זִקְנָת֔וֹ <WH2209> of his old age חָלָ֖ה <WH2470> he was diseased אֶת־ <WH854> in רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> in his feet

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept אָסָא֙ <WH609> And Asa עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵר֙ <WH6912> and was buried עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers בְּעִ֖יר <WH5892> in the city דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> and Jehoshaphat בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ

וְנָדָ֣ב <WH5070> And Nadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יָרָבְעָ֗ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam מָלַךְ֙ <WH4427> began to reign עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over Israel בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year שְׁתַּ֔יִם <WH8147> in the second לְאָסָ֖א <WH609> of Asa מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> and reigned עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> over Israel שְׁנָתָֽיִם׃ <WH8141> years

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> and walked בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way אָבִ֔יו <WH1> of his father וּ֨בְחַטָּאת֔וֹ <WH2403> and in his sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֶחֱטִ֖יא <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> wherewith he made Israel
